title: mrquackquack
author: mrquackquack
content: Hello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. If you have any with some of their listing prices or fees please list them here below. Thanks again.

comments.author: Marvell1
comments.body: Quote from: mrquackquack on September 25, 2022, 01:56:30 AMHello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. If you have any with some of their listing prices or fees please list them here below. Thanks again.You need to find a centralized exchange or a decentralized exchange. If it's a decentralized exchange, you won't have to pay any fees, the listing will be done for free. For centralized exchanges, we have a lot, but I can tell you there won't be free here. If you want something that's both good and free or cheap that doesn't exist today, everything has to be measured in terms of money, that's true. It's just like you want your coin to be used by many people and increase in price so your coin needs to be really good so don't expect something cheap but best out of it.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: Quote from: mrquackquack on September 25, 2022, 01:56:30 AMHello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. If you have any with some of their listing prices or fees please list them here below. Thanks again.You just need to go to the dex to get what you want for your token. In my opinion if these days there are not free listings. The problem is how can your token comply with all of requirements needed by exchange site to list your token. yeah even binance can listing your token for free but the question is what progress that already made by your token? how reliable the platform to support your token? there are bunch of things need to be filled when you wanna see your tokens to be listed in legit exchange site with decent daily trade volume. I think these are valid point to remind you that these days requirements are so hard. I can only suggest bitmart.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: mrquackquack on September 25, 2022, 01:56:30 AMHello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. If you have any with some of their listing prices or fees please list them here below. Thanks again.Centralized exchanges which are highly popular never comes with free listing or the fee which is cheaper, it will be atleast few thousand dollars as far as I know and even the fee is not going to be enough until you meet all their listing criteria. I don't think the fee for listings are available for public so you can contact the exchange for detailed information and also can apply for listings with the provided form and all the information about your project.

comments.author: Dr.Osh
comments.body: Quote from: mrquackquack on September 25, 2022, 01:56:30 AMHello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. If you have any with some of their listing prices or fees please list them here below. Thanks again.maybe DEX is the best place for that. as far as I know, to list on the CEX, requires quite a lot of money, and the better and the quality of the CEX, the higher the fee required. If you want quality, then you need to spend a lot of money for it. If you want to quickly list the coins so that they can be traded, then DEX might be good enough to start with, but if you are targeting CEX, I don't recommend looking for cheap ones, and it might be more memorable when the coins you have listed are the first popular CEXs.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: mrquackquack on September 25, 2022, 01:56:30 AMHello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. If you have any with some of their listing prices or fees please list them here below. Thanks again.You will face the problem of liquidity and therefore listing the platform “for free” does not mean that it will gain sufficient liquidity for its continuity. If you do not have a good marketing plan, your platform will end up without orders or be removed from the central platforms.

comments.author: MidNite36
comments.body: Cheap listing fees equals to bad performance, you will get fake volume and liquidity in return, if your project is new just try to raise fund first and go for good exchanges or else you aren't ready to be part of this crypto space, do not go cheap when it comes to listing on exchanges, you can't compare Kucoin with P2pb2b.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Someone shared before about the prices of listing but that was years ago and I cannot find the thread anymore. Also, there might be some changes in the prices. I do hear news in telegram about how they make a deal, most exchanges will want part of the total coins that you have and then some in USD. Binance has an event of free listing before but it requires a great deal of effort. From re-tweeting to total sold coins of the project in a short span of time.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: I think that you will not find any exchange site with cheap listing fees. Ithink that you shall go to the low tier exchange site but the main problem is if it has no enough liquidity and fully traded by bots. There are so many small exchange sites in the market and only a few exchange sites that were showing the real volume while majority of small exchange sites are manipulating their daily trade volume. This is not a recommended thing to use it. It's better to list your token in dex and add liquidity with your own money

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: mrquackquack on September 25, 2022, 01:56:30 AMHello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. If you have any with some of their listing prices or fees please list them here below. Thanks again.There’s no cheap exchange that offers good trading volume. Most of the cheap centralized exchange offers only small volume and most of them are from fake trading. Your only chance to get listed on exchange with good trading volume are on DEX which doesn’t charge any listing. The only thing you need to do is to make sure that your tokens has sufficient liquidity for traders.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: There are a lot of exchanges now that have community voting for listing altcoins. You can try Kucoin, Kucoin is one of a lot of popular and reputable exchanges. I believe they have community voting on what altcoins that be listed next, so I can consider this is totally free of charge, you just need to win by votes.

comments.author: judaspriest
comments.body: Quote from: GreatArkansas on September 25, 2022, 07:50:51 AMThere are a lot of exchanges now that have community voting for listing altcoins. You can try Kucoin, Kucoin is one of a lot of popular and reputable exchanges. I believe they have community voting on what altcoins that be listed next, so I can consider this is totally free of charge, you just need to win by votes.Yes, listing altcoins on an exchange like Kucoin is a good choice because as you said, the exchange is one of the most popular and trusted exchanges for sure,let's see the result of the community vote on altcoin listing on the exchange

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Quote from: mrquackquack on September 25, 2022, 01:56:30 AMHello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. If you have any with some of their listing prices or fees please list them here below. Thanks again.The listing price now starts at $500,000. This price is the price for an initial good exchange. You are also obliged to pay for the services of a market maker to maintain trading volume.And your coin or token must meet the criteria of the exchange, in terms of the number of users, activity, and so on. It is probably more profitable to start with a decentralized exchange and create a pool . For small commissions, it is better to use Ethereum's L2 solutions.

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: Quote from: zasad@ on September 25, 2022, 10:15:56 AMThe listing price now starts at $500,000. This price is the price for an initial good exchange. You are also obliged to pay for the services of a market maker to maintain trading volume.And your coin or token must meet the criteria of the exchange, in terms of the number of users, activity, and so on. It is probably more profitable to start with a decentralized exchange and create a pool . For small commissions, it is better to use Ethereum's L2 solutions.on which exchange is that charge $500,000 for listing? Quote from: GreatArkansas on September 25, 2022, 07:50:51 AMThere are a lot of exchanges now that have community voting for listing altcoins. You can try Kucoin, Kucoin is one of a lot of popular and reputable exchanges. I believe they have community voting on what altcoins that be listed next, so I can consider this is totally free of charge, you just need to win by votes.i think kucoin now doesn't have community voting only by submitting an Application Form from here How to List a Coin on KuCoin?the exchange that has community voting is Binance but to get there is very hard

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: Quote from: zasad@ on September 25, 2022, 10:15:56 AMQuote from: mrquackquack on September 25, 2022, 01:56:30 AMHello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. If you have any with some of their listing prices or fees please list them here below. Thanks again.The listing price now starts at $500,000. This price is the price for an initial good exchange. You are also obliged to pay for the services of a market maker to maintain trading volume.And your coin or token must meet the criteria of the exchange, in terms of the number of users, activity, and so on. It is probably more profitable to start with a decentralized exchange and create a pool . For small commissions, it is better to use Ethereum's L2 solutions.$500,000 seem enough to create an exchange of you own and have a pool for different tokens.they are making listing fees this high because its to kill the scam projects which usually are from teams who has no inside relation or support from bigger teams. not worthy anymore for scammers to try creating tokens and list. before they can even scam, they have to spend this big.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Binance has said before that they're good listing a project for free as long as they think that you've got the best project.How to achieve that? I don't know, maybe make the most impressive project after all and you'll get a free listing from them. If it's cheap listing, you're likely end up with those exchanges that don't have that much reputation and volume. Increase your budget and you'll get what you're looking for.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: mrquackquack on September 25, 2022, 01:56:30 AMHello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. ..You will not get comprehensive information about the listing price here, since there are no representatives of "reputable crypto exchange" here, and the price for this service may vary depending on the state of the cryptocurrency market. Therefore, you will have to contact the support of the exchange yourself, which meets your criteria, and only there you will receive an exhaustive answer about the listing.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: GreatArkansas on September 25, 2022, 07:50:51 AMThere are a lot of exchanges now that have community voting for listing altcoins. You can try Kucoin, Kucoin is one of a lot of popular and reputable exchanges. I believe they have community voting on what altcoins that be listed next, so I can consider this is totally free of charge, you just need to win by votes.This can be an alternative option if the project we are talking about here is good and with a good community back up, aside from this decentralized platform might be the best option as well while you are still working with the project, CEX listing can be done after. Better to focus first on the development of the project, make a good marketing campaign and make the project known by many. Exchange listing is very crucial move for every update, you should not rush it.

comments.author: samuraijin
comments.body: Quote from: mrquackquack on September 25, 2022, 01:56:30 AMHello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. If you have any with some of their listing prices or fees please list them here below. Thanks again.Have you tried using this method, buying Coins that have cheaper shipping costs, such as making Coins available to XLM, TRON, BSC, USDT, or others, because I use this method, in order to get cheaper shipping costs, if you use Bitcoin, Ethereum, of course you will incur quite expensive transaction fees, maybe I can cost 10 dollars in transactions..

comments.author: antsam
comments.body: Quote from: Marvell1 on September 25, 2022, 02:34:30 AMQuote from: mrquackquack on September 25, 2022, 01:56:30 AMHello I am looking for a reputable crypto exchange with good 24 hr. volume/trading and a fairly reasonably priced or free listing. If you have any with some of their listing prices or fees please list them here below. Thanks again.You need to find a centralized exchange or a decentralized exchange. If it's a decentralized exchange, you won't have to pay any fees, the listing will be done for free. For centralized exchanges, we have a lot, but I can tell you there won't be free here. If you want something that's both good and free or cheap that doesn't exist today, everything has to be measured in terms of money, that's true. It's just like you want your coin to be used by many people and increase in price so your coin needs to be really good so don't expect something cheap but best out of it.Yes, that's right, decentralized exchange is the answer for cheap fees and even free for listing your tokens/coins. But how can you look for an exchange that has a good trading volume but is cheap if what is meant is CEX, because you can be sure it will require large capital
